title: How does it feel?
creator_credit: Pictures That Move, Arts Council of Great Britain and Mick Csaky
brief_description: Covers various areas of neurophysiology, creativity and bio energetic therapy, with a commentary about getting back in touch with our senses. Gives a number of insights about human nature, twentieth century living conditions and creativity. Based on the book by Frances Hudson.
